titleStmt.title: The Welsh-mens glory, or, the famous victories of the ancient Britains obtain'd upon St. David's day

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Th. Dawks, his Majesties British printer, at the West-end of Thames-street,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Verse - "The honor, glory and the grace".
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
